::Killfest/Incarcinator::

Killfest nods. "Allright," he says, walking out of the room and making sure that DrillBit was walking with him (hope you don't mind me assuming that he is, Robo).

"You meant on this upcoming battle, correct?" Killfest asks, looking around.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Incarcinator spins around, growling. "Watch where you're going!" He barks at KitKat, almost backing up into a chair.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::KitKat2/StarScream/DrillBit::
> 
> StarScream gets up.
> "I'm gonna go geta  drink. If there is to be a battle, I'm going to get
> drunk first." He chuckled at his lame joke. He headed out and down the
> hall.
> 
> KitKat2 turns to him.
> "I'll join you." She turned to SilverScout.
> "If you'll excuse me." She then turned to DrillBit.
> "C'ya in a bit darling." 
> 
> The both walked to the Mess Hall. As they entered, KitKat2 accidently
> bumbed into Incarcinator, as they went to the replicators.
> 
> Back at the meeting room, DrillBit decided him and Killfest need to go
> and discuss plans. 
> "Killfest, lets walk and discuss our options." He walks out and down the
> hall.
